[Home](./index.md) &gt; [jest-prosemirror](./jest-prosemirror.md) &gt; [CommandTransformation](./jest-prosemirror.commandtransformation.md)

## CommandTransformation interface

Tests that a command run transform the nodes from one state to another. The second state is optional if nothing has changed.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface CommandTransformation<GSchema extends EditorSchema = any> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [from](./jest-prosemirror.commandtransformation.from.md) | <code>TaggedProsemirrorNode&lt;GSchema&gt;</code> | The initial prosemirror node.
```ts
import { doc, p, strong} from 'jest-prosemirror';

const from = doc(p('Hello ', strong('Friend')));

```
 |
|  [to](./jest-prosemirror.commandtransformation.to.md) | <code>TaggedProsemirrorNode&lt;GSchema&gt;</code> | The output of the command transformation.
```ts
import { doc, p, strong} from 'jest-prosemirror';

const to = doc(p(strong('Friend')));

```
This is optional and can be omitted if the transformation doesn't produce any results. |
